name: Honor Troll
oracle_text:
Vigilance
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Honor Troll gets +2/+1 as long as you have 25 or more life.
flavor_text: First in his clan to attend Strixhaven, and now first in his class.

name: Biblioplex Assistant
oracle_text: When Biblioplex Assistant enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining."
—Isabough of the Biblioplex

name: Culling Ritual
oracle_text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.
flavor_text: "Your own frailty is your undoing. I am merely the one to expose it."

name: Deadly Brew
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If you sacrificed a permanent this way, you may return another permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: No one ever asked what was in Dina's concoctions, so long as they worked.

name: Fracture
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Your defiance is amusing, little mage. It's time you learn how fragile you really are."
—Extus Narr

name: Rip Apart
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Torn from history. Torn from memory. Torn from reality.

name: Rushed Rebirth
oracle_text: Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, search your library for a creature card with lesser mana value, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Witherbloom students learn to see death not as a tragedy, but as opportunity.

name: Venerable Warsinger
oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample
Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

name: The Biblioplex
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it into your graveyard. Activate only if you have exactly zero or seven cards in hand.

name: "Bayou Snapper"
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.

name: "Big Play"
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: "Hungry Tentacles"
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. When that permanent dies this turn, you gain 2 life.

name: "Daemogoth Anguish-Eater"
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
When you sacrifice "Daemogoth Anguish-Eater", each opponent discards a card and you draw a card and gain 2 life.

name: "Blood Sommelier"
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on.

card_faces.name: "Pestilent Cauldron"
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
{1}, {T}: Each opponent mills X cards, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
{4}, {T}: Exile four target cards from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card_faces.name: "Restorative Spell"
card_faces.oracle_text:
Return up to two target creature, land, and/or planeswalker cards from your graveyard to your hand. Each player gains 4 life.
Exile "Restorative Spell".

card_faces.name: "Pestilent Cauldron"
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
{1}, {T}: Each opponent mills X cards, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
{4}, {T}: Exile four target cards from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card_faces.name: "Restorative Spell"
card_faces.oracle_text:
Return up to two target creature, land, and/or planeswalker cards from your graveyard to your hand. Each player gains 4 life.
Exile "Restorative Spell".

name: Overgrown Arch
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: You gain 1 life.
{2}, Sacrificie Overgrown Arch: Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Containment Breach
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If its mana value is 2 or less, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor_text: For pest keepers, there's no sound more disheartening than breaking class.

name: Daemogoth Titan
oracle_text: Whenever Daemogoth Titan attacks or blocks, sacrifice a creature.
flavor_text:
"Of course it offered you power. Demons always do. But trust me—the sweeter the prize, the ruinous the price."
—Professor Onyx

name: Pillardrop Warden
oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pillardrop Warden: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: A giant statue of a dwarf is still a giant statue.

name: Professor of Zoomancy
oracle_text: When Professor of Zoomancy enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor_text: She's brilliant, if a bit overbearing.

name: Dina, Soul Steeper
oracle_text:
Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Dina, Soul Steeper gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

name: Hunt for Specimens
oracle_text:
Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Segemoor Witch
oracle_text:
Menance
Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "Whenever this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

name: Witherbloom Campus
oracle_text:
Witherbloom Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students fascinated by the energies of life and death choose Witherbloom, the college of essence studies.

name: Witherbloom Pledgemage
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Death is just a transfer of energy. Those pests I harvested have the honor of becoming pure magic. What could be more beautiful?"

name: Professor's Warning
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: Professor Onyx urged the twins to prepare for the dark mage Extus, sounding very much like someone familiar with the rise of tyrants.

name: Unwilling Ingredient
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Exile Unwilling Ingredient from your graveyard: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Don't look at me like that. It was either this or being eaten by a groff."
—Dina, Witherbloom mage-student

name: Pigment Storm
oracle_text: Pigment Storm deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
flavor_text: When art projects collapse, Prismari students revel in the beauty of destruction. Everyone else run for cover.

name: Harness Infinity
oracle_text:
Exchange your hand and graveyard.
Exile Harness Infinity.
flavor_text:
"As I stepped into the star arch, it all became perfectly clear. Life and death are not opposites, but an endless path, twisting around and back upon itself, never ending and never beginning."
—Zhaer, professor of biophilosophy

name: Excavated Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}, {T}: Mill a card. (Put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Don't be fooled by the quiet. These old stones are trying to talk to you."
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Zephyr Boots
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Dream Strix
oracle_text:
Flying
When Dream Strix becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.
When Dream Strix dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Blex, Vexing Pest // Search for Blex

card_faces.name: Blex, Vexing Pest
card_faces.oracle_text:
Other Pests, Bats, Insects, Snakes, and Spiders you control get +1/+1.
When Blex, Vexing Pest dies, you gain 4 life.
card_faces.flavor_text: Pests are typically harvested before they outgrow their enclosures. Blex is far from typical.

card_faces.name: Search for Blex
card_faces.oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put any number of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 3 life for each card put into your hand this way.

name: Infuse with Vitality
oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target creature gains deathtouch and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Dina raised her cup to Killian's lips, and for the first time in his life, he knew compassion.

name: Beledros Witherbloom
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
Pay 10 life: Untap all lands you control. Activate only once each turn.

name: Callous Bloodmage
oracle_text:
When Callous Bloodmage enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Exile target player's graveyard.

name: Beledros Witherbloom
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
Pay 10 life: Untap all lands you control. Activate only once each turn.

name: Poet's Quill
Scurrid Colony
oracle_text:
Reach
Scurrid Colony gets +2/+2 as long as you control eight or more lands.
flavor_text: Scurrit teeth evolved to crack open notes, but they work was well for crushing bones if the nest is threatened.

name: Poet's Quill
Pillardrop Rescuer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Pillardrop Rescuer enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Gentle hands of stone whisk the carless from the crumbling ruins of Pillardrop.

name: Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios // Journey to the Oracle

card_faces.name: Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios
card_faces.oracle_text:
Discard a card: Return Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios to its owner's hand.
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield.

card_faces.name: Journey to the Oracle
card_faces.oracle_text: You may put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Then if you control eight or more lands, you may discard a card. If you do, return Journey to the Oracle to it owner's hand.

name: Leech Fanatic
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Leech Fanatic has lifelink.
flavor_text: "Everyone thinks that leeches maintain a strictly sanguivorous diet, but in fact, most freshwater leeches are carnivores. Wait, where are you going?"

name: Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios // Journey to the Oracle

card_faces.name: Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios
card_faces.oracle_text:
Discard a card: Return Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios to its owner's hand.
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield.

card_faces.name: Journey to the Oracle
card_faces.oracle_text: You may put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Then if you control eight or more lands, you may discard a card. If you do, return Journey to the Oracle to it owner's hand.

name: Spined Karok
flavor_text:
"The bogs are deeper than you realize. Most of the space beneath the surface is take up by these enormous kapoks. You might think your feet are touching the bottom. They're probably not."
—Gyome, Witherbloom chef

name: Tempted by the Oriq
oracle_text: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls with mana value 3 or less.
flavor_text: To exact his vengeance, Extus needed followers. His infiltrators recruited promising mage-students from the very halls he sought to destroy.

name: Tend the Pests
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Create X 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life," where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor_text: "I've got a special treat for you today."

name: Blrackish Trudge
oracle_text:
Blrackish Trudge enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Blrackish Trudge from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you gained life this turn.
flavor_text: Most trudges are covered with decaying plant matter, making them idea breeding grounds for fungal spores.

name: Reject
oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {3}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Grux, for the last time, you have to do more than simply shout 'Apply!' at the administrators."
—Pavil, admissions officer
